name: Nitro Booster
specialRules: Once per game, when this vehicle activates, it gains the 'Up to Full' effect without spending a hazard token.

name: Roll Cage
specialRules: This vehicle may re-roll one skid die for each collision or wipeout it suffers.

name: Armor Plating
specialRules: This vehicle gains +1 hull point (included in its max hull).

name: Ram
specialRules: This vehicle gains +1 attack die when it causes a collision.

name: Spiked Ram
specialRules: This vehicle gains +2 attack dice when it causes a collision.

name: Tank Tracks
specialRules: This vehicle ignores rough terrain penalties and may re-roll up to two skid dice each time it suffers a collision or wipeout.

name: Truck Cab
specialRules: This vehicle can tow trailers and other vehicles.

name: Extra Crew
specialRules: This vehicle may re-roll one attack die or one defense die per phase.

name: Bullet-Proof Tires
specialRules: This vehicle treats tire blowouts as superficial damage.

name: Reinforced Frame
specialRules: This vehicle gains +2 hull points (included in its max hull).

name: Heavy Armor
specialRules: This vehicle gains +3 hull points (included in its max hull).

name: Prison Car
specialRules: Flag carrier bonus. This vehicle can carry captured audience members.

name: Roll Bar
specialRules: This vehicle treats vehicle flipped onto its roof as a spin.

name: Limited Slip Differential
specialRules: This vehicle may re-roll one skid die once per activation.

name: Experimental Nuclear Engine
specialRules: This vehicle treats Spin results as Slide results. If this vehicle is wrecked, all vehicles within medium range suffer 1 damage point.

name: Proximity Mine
specialRules: Once per game, during this vehicle's activation, you may place a proximity mine drop template anywhere the vehicle moved over this activation.

name: Trailer
specialRules: This vehicle may tow a trailer that provides +2 weapon slots.

name: Gyroscope
specialRules: This vehicle may re-roll one skid die when it suffers a collision or wipeout.

name: Ejector Seat
specialRules: When this vehicle is wrecked, if no audience members have been captured by the controlling player, place an audience member within short range.

name: Grenades
specialRules: This vehicle gains the grenades weapon (included already, rules in the rulebook).
